title: 12 PCS Scratch Art, Rainbow Scratch Notes with Scratching Tools Kit City Series Rainbow Scratch Art for Adults and Kids (A5 Size)
features: [Complete Kit for Creative Fun] This set includes 12 sheets of A5 scratch art paper (20 x 14cm), 2 scratch pens (black, red), 6 wooden stylus, and 1 cleaning brush, providing everything you need for various scratch art for kids and scratch art for adults projects.

[Safe, High-Quality Materials] Made from non-toxic, eco-friendly coloured hardboard coated with black, this scratch paper set is safe for the human body and the environment, ensuring a fun and healthy experience while you enjoy your paint by scratch adult hobby.

[Simple & Artistic to Use] Simply use the wooden stylus to scratch away the black coating, revealing colourful designs underneath—easy to use, making it a perfect option for beginners and those exploring engraving art or foil scratch art for kids.

[Versatile & Relaxing] This scratch art set is perfect for kids to develop creativity and for adults to unwind. It also doubles as a fantastic decoration, helping to relieve stress and offering a therapeutic escape for those interested in hobbies for adults women.

[Fun Gift] Create beautiful rainbow scratch art and turn your creations into gifts. Pair the artwork with frames to make a thoughtful, personal gift for friends, family, or as an ideal foil art for adults activity.
description: Product Description What age group is this scratch art set suitable for? Perfect for ages 6+, kids develop focus & creativity. Younger ones may need help. Teens & adults also enjoy its relaxing, rewarding nature. Great for family fun! What tools and materials are included in the set? Includes large & postcard animal designs, fine-tip stylus & brush. Stylus for details, brush for cleanup. Vibrant results, high-quality tools for smooth creativity. Is this art set suitable as a gift? Yes! Ideal for birthdays, Christmas. Colorful finished pieces can be framed. Kids love it, great value, and sure to delight anyone!
